language.baotxt: Congratulations on getting rich, good luck
language.hair: Deposit EOS creating a lucky red packet, set a red packet number and choose EOS amount.
language.hair1: After created successfully, the system will create 10 random amount portions (every portion goes the highest to 30% of the packets , the lowest to 5%). While waiting for other users to take packets over
language.hair2: over 24hrs,  the left EOS will return aromatically.
language.rob: Choose a EOS amount red packet room. Deposit EOS, get red packets for free with 100% wining.
language.step: The EOS players took, if the EOS amount’s tail number = red packet number is the “boom stepper”, the deposits of other players will reward to red packet sender.
language.wa: Every red packet means different amount of OWN token, grabbing red packets means mining
language.jiang: Player grabbed EOS amount are in pairs, whole number, straight, three of a kind, four of a kind, biggest number and smallest number can get extra lucky reward.
language.morerule: More details please refer to White Paper.
language.explain: If other players got the same EOS tail number as the red packet, the deposits of other players will reward to u
language.explain1: Aromatically take random 10 packets of EOS amount
language.results1: The EOS amount’s tail number you got=the red packet number
language.prompt: can not take from  your own packet

language.hair: 创建一个拼手气红包，设定一个0-9的红包号码作为踩雷的判断号码，并选择一个EOS金额放进红包。
language.hair1: 创建成功后系统将随机生成金额不等的10份（每份上限为红包的30%，下限为红包的5%），等待其他用户抢红包。
language.hair2: 超过24小时，未抢完的EOS自动返还。
language.rob: 选择一个金额的红包房间，抵押相应的EOS免费开启拼手气红包，100%中奖。
language.step: 玩家抢到的EOS数量的尾数=红包的号码时为踩雷者，其抵押的EOS将会奖励给发包者。是否踩雷，并不影响玩家抢到的EOS。
language.wa: 每个红包将包含数量不等的平台代币 OWN，抢红包即挖矿
language.jiang: 玩家抢到 EOS 数量为：对子，三条，整数，顺子，炸弹，最小数，最大数，将可以额外得到幸运奖励。
language.morerule: 更多详细内容查看白皮书。
language.explain: 如果其他玩家抢到的EOS数量的尾数=红包的号码时您将，其抵押的EOS将会奖励给您
language.explain1: 自动拆分为EOS数量随机的10份
language.results1: 您抢到的EOS数量的尾数=红包的号码
